name: Mergeuz Sausages
recipeIngredient: 120 g ground or finely chopped fat,
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped or pressed,
recipeInstructions: 1. Mince the meat through a 6mm plate.
2. Mix the ingredients in a bowl. (Add ice water?)
3. Mince the batch again through a 6mm plate or process briefly in a food processor.
4. Fill out into pre soaked natural sheep casings 20/22 or 22/24.
